chatbotSetup.notInPlan: You are not in a plan that includes AI
chatbotSetup.aiSystemInstructionsPlaceholder: Enter the instructions. For example: You stop every hour and make 3 tasks every hour.

chatbotSetup.greetingMessageDescription: Greeting message will be displayed to the user when they open your referral link on your platform
chatbotSetup.noteGreetingMessagePriority: Note: Greeting message priority is higher than the Message Configuration and the AI System
chatbotSetup.greetingFooterPlaceholder: Enter the footer. For example: Thank you for your business.
chatbotSetup.greetingHeaderPlaceholder: Enter the header. For example: Hello! Welcome to our store! Choose from the following options
chatbotSetup.optionPlaceholder: E.g. See Services, See Products, See Prices
chatbotSetup.responsePlaceholder: E.g. I'm happy to help you with your order!
chatbotSetup.greetingTriggerWordPlaceholder: Enter the trigger word for the greeting message. For example: Hi, Hello, Menu
chatbotSetup.thatsHowYourMessageWillLook: That's how your message will look
chatbotSetup.greetingTriggerWordMessagePlaceholder: Enter the sentence preceding the trigger word. For example: To call this message again write (DO NOT USE COLON)
